sub_fields.label: Pin Type
sub_fields.name: pin_type
sub_fields.instructions: This is the icon that will be displayed on the map for each location in this group.

sub_fields.label: The Icon
sub_fields.name: the_icon
sub_fields.instructions: Upload your own image to display as a pin on the map.

sub_fields.label: Static Locations
sub_fields.name: static_locations
sub_fields.instructions: If this group is static all of the locations will be displayed on the map no matter what.  If this group is dynamic the locations will only show up when activated. This setting will have no effect if you choose to display all locations in the map settings.

sub_fields.label: Group Trigger
sub_fields.name: group_trigger
sub_fields.instructions: This is the unique html attribute that when clicked will trigger the display of this location group. Use jQuery selector syntax (.className, [attributename=value], #id, etc).

sub_fields.label: Group Icon
sub_fields.name: group_icon
sub_fields.instructions: This  image will be displayed as a clickable tab to show/hide all of the locations in this group.

sub_fields.label: Animation
sub_fields.name: animation
sub_fields.instructions: Select the type of animation that will be applied to every pin in this group.

sub_fields.label: Allow Clickable Pins?
sub_fields.name: allow_clickable_pins
sub_fields.instructions: Select this option if you would like your map pins to be clickable. When clicked the pin usually opens a small info window with relevant information to the location but these settings can also be customized.

sub_fields.label: Infowindow Display Fields
sub_fields.name: infowindow_display_fields
sub_fields.instructions: Select the items that you would like to have displayed in the infowindow that pops up after clicking on a location pin.  Remember that if no information is supplied for the selected fields, then no information will be displayed when the location pin is clicked.

sub_fields.label: Map Center
sub_fields.name: map_center
sub_fields.instructions: The latitude and longitude(i.e. 33.7593143,-84.39285) for the center of your map.

sub_fields.label: Reorient Map Based on Locations?
sub_fields.name: reorient_map_based_on_locations
sub_fields.instructions: Select this option if you would like the bounds of the map to by dynamically increased or decreased based on the locations of the pins you have added to the map. Note that by selecting this option the initial Map Zoom level will be ignored when displaying the map.

sub_fields.label: Map Zoom Level
sub_fields.name: map_zoom_level
sub_fields.instructions: The initial zoom level for your map (1-21).

sub_fields.label: Div ID
sub_fields.name: div_id
sub_fields.instructions: The unique ID for the HTML element that will contain the map

sub_fields.label: Map Styles
sub_fields.name: map_styles
sub_fields.instructions: Copy and paste the JSON styles for your map here. Customize your own styles at https://mapstyle.withgoogle.com/ or https://snazzymaps.com/

sub_fields.label: Map Type
sub_fields.name: map_type
sub_fields.instructions: Choose what type of map you would like to display.

sub_fields.label: Map Max Zoom
sub_fields.name: map_max_zoom
sub_fields.instructions: The maximum level that this map can be zoomed to (1-21).

sub_fields.label: Map Min Zoom
sub_fields.name: map_min_zoom
sub_fields.instructions: The minimum level that this map can be zoomed to (1-21).

sub_fields.label: Map UI
sub_fields.name: map_ui
sub_fields.instructions: Choose whether or not to display the default Google Maps UI on your map.

sub_fields.label: Map Background Color
sub_fields.name: map_background_color
sub_fields.instructions: This color will show up as the background color for tiles while the map is loading.

sub_fields.label: Enable Scroll Wheel
sub_fields.name: scroll_wheel
sub_fields.instructions: Allow the user to zoom in and out of the map with the scroll wheel.

sub_fields.label: Draggable
sub_fields.name: draggable
sub_fields.instructions: Allow the user to move around the map by clicking and dragging the mouse.

sub_fields.label: Show All Locations
sub_fields.name: show_all_locations
sub_fields.instructions: Select this option if you wish to display all locations on the map at once instead of using an image or some other custom trigger to display one group at a time.

sub_fields.label: Map Center
sub_fields.name: map_center
sub_fields.instructions: The latitude and longitude(i.e. 33.7593143,-84.39285) for the center of your map.

sub_fields.label: Map Zoom Level
sub_fields.name: map_zoom_level
sub_fields.instructions: The initial zoom level for your map (1-21).

sub_fields.label: Div ID
sub_fields.name: div_id
sub_fields.instructions: The unique ID for the HTML element that will contain the map

sub_fields.label: Map Styles
sub_fields.name: map_styles
sub_fields.instructions:
Copy and paste the JSON styles for your map here.
